General.Name: Grand Korea Leisure Co. Ltd
General.Description: Grand Korea Leisure Co., Ltd. operates as a casino company in South Korea. It operates Seven Luck casino, a foreigner-only casino. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
